title: Create post-swipe mockup screens (Steps 10-12)
description:
Create UI mockup components for background, notifications, and paywall screens.

Files to create:
- app/fo-03/components/step-background.tsx
- app/fo-03/components/step-notifications.tsx
- app/fo-03/components/step-paywall.tsx

Step 10 - Background Selection (UI mockup):
- Headline: Make your affirmations look beautiful
- Text: Choose a background for your affirmations - you can always explore more later.
- UI: Grid of 4-6 placeholder background images
- Selection highlights but does not persist
- CTA: Continue

Step 11 - Notifications (UI mockup):
- Headline: Set up reminders with your personal affirmations
- Text: Affirmations work best when they gently meet you again and again.
- Question: How many times a day would you like one sent to you?
- UI: Frequency buttons (1, 2, 3, 5 times)
- Non-functional selection
- CTA: Continue

Step 12 - Light Paywall (UI mockup):
- Headline: More support, whenever you want
- Text: Get 3 days free of premium. With Premium, you can create hundreds of lists and expand your personal list with 100s of affirmations.
- CTAs: Try free for 3 days / Not now (both proceed to next step)
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; ls app/fo-03/components/ shows step-background.tsx, step-notifications.tsx, step-paywall.tsx
closed_reason: Created 3 mockup components (step-background.tsx, step-notifications.tsx, step-paywall.tsx) following FO-02 patterns. Updated fo-experience.tsx to integrate them for Steps 10-12. Background has 6 gradient options, notifications has 1/2/3/5x frequency options per spec, paywall has try/not now CTAs.
